resources.string:
Hubble ltd provide products to commercial, public and industrial customers such as parastatals, hospitals, churches, schools, universities, wildlife conservancies, agricultural, hospitality and oil industry as well as county governments, community groups, SMEs, estate agents, landlords and home owners.
We offer high-quality equipment at competitive prices, manufactured by reputable companies.\n\n In total we supply over 400 products and services both personally and online.Hubble will find the best solutions for you, our customers and we guarantee that we wonâ€™t be beaten on our value proposition, as part of our best price guarantee.

How to login 
 1. click on login 
 2. Enter your username and password 
 3. Click on the login button to login. 
 
 Ho to register 
 1. Click on register link 
 2. on the next interface enter the required details 
 3. click on the register button to register 
 
 
 1. Login to your account 
 2. select a product/service 
 3. Enter the quantity in products 
 4. click on send to cart
